src:
巨人　秋季キャンプメンバー２６選手を発表　日本シリーズ経験の岡本、田中俊、山本ら

01 Nov 2019

　巨人は１日、６日から行われる秋季キャンプの参加メンバー２６選手を発表した。
　投手陣は来季２年目の高橋ら１１選手。野手陣は主砲岡本、大城、田中俊、若林、山本ら日本シリーズも経験した選手を中心に１５選手となった。
　【投手】
　高橋優貴、鍬原拓也、桜井俊貴、今村信貴、直江大輔、横川凱、大江竜聖、戸郷翔征、沼田翔平、田中優大、與那原大剛
　【捕手】
　大城卓三、田中貴也、高山竜太朗
　【内野手】
　岡本和真、田中俊太、北村拓己、山本泰寛、若林晃弘、増田大輝、湯浅大
　【外野手】
　石川慎吾、重信慎之介、松原聖弥、村上海斗、山下航汰
text:
Giant announces 26 autumn camp members players Okamoto, Shun Tanaka, Yamamoto et al.

01 Nov 2019

The giant announced 26 participating members of the autumn camp that will be held from the 1st and 6th.
The pitchers are 11 players such as Takahashi, who are in their second year next season. The fielders were 15 players, mainly those who also experienced the Japanese series such as main gun Okamoto, Oshiro, Shun Tanaka, Wakabayashi, Yamamoto.
[Pitcher]
Yuki Takahashi, Takuya Sugawara, Toshiki Sakurai, Nobutaka Imamura, Daisuke Naoe, Jun Yokokawa, Ryusei Oe, Shosei Togo, Shohei Numata, Yudai Tanaka, Daigo Sanahara
[Catcher]
Takuzo Oshiro, Takaya Tanaka, Ryutaro Takayama
[Infielder]
Kazuma Okamoto, Shunta Tanaka, Takumi Kitamura, Yasuhiro Yamamoto, Akihiro Wakabayashi, Daiki Masuda, Yuasa University
[Outfielder]
Shingo Ishikawa, Shinnosuke Shigenobu, Seiya Matsubara, Dou Mura Shanghai, Koji Yamashita
